item.title: Dozens die after boat hits tree stump in Nigeria
item.description: The overloaded boat was carrying passengers including children when it hit a submerged tree stump.

item.title: 'Out of control': Witnesses describe fatal Lisbon funicular crash
item.description: The crash killed at least 17 people and injured 20 more, some critically, Portuguese authorities say.

item.title: Who are the victims of the Lisbon funicular cable crash?
item.description: A transport worker is among those killed, while a three-year-old German boy is reported to have escaped with minor injuries.

item.title: Allies ready to support Ukraine before and after peace deal, says UK
item.description: The UK and other allies hope to obtain clear US backing for their efforts to shore up Ukraine's defences.

item.title: Guyana President Irfaan Ali claims victory in general election
item.description: The incumbent president claimed victory in an election dominated by how to manage the country's vast oil reserves.
